Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Troy in 1968...
Traded from Troy to Boston (UBA) on 3/2/1968 (Going to PIL: CF B. Rodriguez. Going to TRO: C C. Davis, 1B J. Marsh)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1970, off Robert Holland (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/6/1970, off Don Kleiman (CI)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Troy on 4/30/1973...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1974, hitting .556 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1974, hitting .441 with 8 HR, 15 RBI...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1974, hitting .455 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1975, hitting .536 with 0 HR, 3 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Lynchburg on 4/11/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1976, hitting .483 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1976, hitting .375 with 11 HR, 28 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Troy on 5/4/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Diablo on 6/22/1977...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/19/1977...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Longport on 7/23/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1977, hitting .531 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1977, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 26 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 8/2/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1977, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1978, hitting .384 with 6 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1978, hitting .444 with 10 HR, 23 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1978, hitting .349 with 33 HR, 112 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1979, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1979, hitting .370 with 6 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1979, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1979, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1980, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1980, hitting .450 with 5 HR, 17 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 8/10/1980...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/26/1980, off Gregory Johnson (DIA)...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1980, hitting .329 with 23 HR, 89 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1982, hitting .368 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1982, hitting .325 with 29 HR, 107 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Penn on 4/1/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1983, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1983, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1983...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1984...
Had 3000th career hit on 9/7/1985, off Lester Schiff (Ash)...
